alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:02PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Camp Verde, Chino Valley, Congress, Cottonwood, Paulden and Prescott Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 AM Friday: Camp Verde 0 to 1 inches Chino Valley 2 to 4 inches Congress 0 to 1 inches Cottonwood 0 to 1 inches Paulden 2 to 4 inches Prescott Valley 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
